root.name: Putt-Putt and Fatty Bear's Activity Pack
root.description: Putt-Putt and Fatty Bear's Activity Pack combines Putt Putt's Activity Pack and Fatty Bear's Activity Pack into one game with 4 new minigames, totaling at 15 minigames. Each minigame has 4 difficulty levels, easy, medium, hard, and hardest. Some games are traditional, while others are retitled popular games, such as Remember playing the same as Memory. While others are just for creative play like Fatty Bear's Coloring. Putt-Putt's Activity pack Games Tic-Tac-Toe Puzzle Blocks Pinball Remember Hangman Checkers Fatty Bear's Activity Pack Games Reversi Lines and Boxes Go Fish Coloring Tangrams New Games Word Hunt Guess It! On-Ramps and Off-Ramps Circus Stormin'
